overview:
Sher Ali is the founder and Chief Creative Officer of lucidstudios.net.

Sher Ali, was raised in Rawalpindi/Islamabad, Pakistan. He received a degree in Master of Sciences in Computer Sciences from Bahria University in Islamabad in 2010.

Sher Ali is a self taught multimedia developer and has been developing interactive, dynamic and engaging flash websites and applications since 2005. As the technologies are evolving, Sher is also exploring new areas like WordPress, HTML5/CSS3, and mobile applications development.

He remained technical reviewer at envato marketplaces from March 2008 to May 2008.
